alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 7:00PM EDT until May 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fulton County in north central Indiana... Cass County in north central Indiana... Western Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walton, or near Grissom Afb, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Logansport, Peru, Rochester, Grissom Afb, Walton, Bunker Hill, Mexico, Lincoln, Wells, Galveston, Denver, Fulton, Macy, Onward, Nyena Lake, Leases Corner, Deedsville, Hoover, Nead and Anoka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
